description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 42 (Samples of Materials) Plot B Phase 1 of planning permission 20/02942/FUL  states: 42 A) Notwithstanding any materials specified in the application, details of any bricks to be used in any Development Plot or Phase shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority before the installation of any bricks in that Detailed or Outline Phase.The developer shall display the sample materials of the proposed bricks on a 'mock-up' of each phase, the details of the mock-up to be agreed with the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.B) Notwithstanding any materials specified in the application details and/or samples of all other facing materials (except bricks) to be used  in a Development Plot or Phase shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority before any installation of such materials in that Detailed or Outline Phase. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: In order to assess the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the appearance of the locality.Officer response: The submitted information and the proposed bricks mock-up display is considered to be sufficient. As such, the details submitted in relation to condition 42 Plot B Phase 1 only are hereby approved.
